text:
William Emerson "Will" Arnett (born May 4, 1970) is a Canadian-American actor, voice actor, comedian and producer. He starred in the "Arrested Development" and "30 Rock". He also played Lego Batman in animated movies, "The Lego Movie", "The Lego Batman Movie" and '.
Arnett was born in Toronto. He married Penelope Ann Miller from 1994 to 1995. Arnett married Amy Poehler from 2003 to 2016. They have two children.
